Author: gimmethatdamnavocado
Text: Had a body composition scan recently and was told I need to gain 2.2kg of muscles. Guess itâ€™s rest day for me today ðŸŽ‰

Author: SubBiscuit
Text: Muscle increase happens during rest. Even if you have an active rest day (walking, restorative yoga, etc) they can rest.  I'd say you work out a TON but it depends on your rest - it sounds like you dont get enough.  Stretching and foam rolling can also help speed recovery/rest.  Even if building muscle isnt your goal getting even a lil bit more will increase your TDEE.
